sense.def:
Kadar sta bili osebi ali stvari pravkar omenjeni, drugo imenujemo
the latter
.

seg.quote: They were eating sandwiches and little iced cakes, (the latter obtained from Mrs Kaul's bakery).
The novel was made into a film in 1943 and again in 1967: I prefer the latter version to the former.

sense.def:
Z izrazom
latter
opišemo drugi del obdobja.

seg.quote: By the latter half of July the total was well over two million.
